languages.text:
The Vanguard chooses an ally. All enemies in a 3-cell radius around this ally must make a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|ResistancePenalty|dac2896f1b4249648300531819f4d31d} penalty. On a failed {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}, the Vanguard becomes their {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g}.
Regardless of the Willpower resistance test results, the chosen ally does not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} from these enemies, can shoot enemies in melee range, and move as if not within range of attacks of opportunity.
languages.original_text:
Авангард выбирает союзника. Все противники в радиусе 3 клеток от него должны пройти {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверку{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воли{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со штрафом −{uip|ResistancePenalty|dac2896f1b4249648300531819f4d31d}. В случае провала авангард становится для этого противника {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}приоритетной целью{/g}.
Вне зависимости от результата проверки выбранный союзник не провоцирует {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атаки по возможности{/g} от этих противников, а также может стрелять вблизи и двигаться, игнорируя ограничения, связанные с атаками по возможности.

traits.locale_text:
The Vanguard chooses an ally. All enemies in a 3-cell radius around this ally must make a Willpower test with a -<u>5×(Vanguard's FEL bonus)</u> penalty. On a failed test, the Vanguard becomes their priority target.
Regardless of the Willpower test results, the ally does not provoke attacks of opportunity from these enemies and can shoot enemies in melee range and move as if not within range of attacks of opportunity.

The Vanguard chooses an ally. All enemies in a 3-cell radius around this ally must make a Willpower test with a −<u>(5 × Vanguard's FEL bonus)</u> penalty. On a failed test, the Vanguard becomes their priority target.
Regardless of the Willpower test results, the ally does not provoke attacks of opportunity from these enemies, can shoot enemies in melee range, and move as if not within range of attacks of opportunity.

The Vanguard chooses an ally. All enemies in a 3-cell radius around this ally must make a Willpower test with a −<u>(5 × Vanguard's FEL bonus)</u> penalty. On a failed test, the Vanguard becomes their priority target.
Regardless of the Willpower test results, the ally does not provoke attacks of opportunity from these enemies, can shoot enemies in melee range, and move as if not within range of attacks of opportunity.

The Vanguard chooses an ally. All enemies in a 3-cell radius around this ally must make a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a −{uip|ResistancePenalty|dac2896f1b4249648300531819f4d31d} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}. On a failed test, the Vanguard becomes their {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g}.
Regardless of the Willpower test results, the ally does not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}attack of opportunity{/g} from these enemies, can shoot enemies in {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee range{/g}, and move as if not within {g|Encyclopedia:Range}range{/g} of attacks of opportunity.

The Vanguard chooses an ally. All enemies in a 3-cell radius around this ally must make a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|ResistancePenalty|dac2896f1b4249648300531819f4d31d} penalty. On a failed {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}, the Vanguard becomes their {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g}.
Regardless of the Willpower resistance test results, the chosen ally does not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} from these enemies, can shoot enemies in melee range, and move as if not within range of attacks of opportunity.

Авангард выбирает союзника. Все противники в радиусе 3 клеток от него должны пройти {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверку{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воли{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со штрафом −{uip|ResistancePenalty|dac2896f1b4249648300531819f4d31d}. В случае провала авангард становится для этого противника {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}приоритетной целью{/g}.
Вне зависимости от результата проверки выбранный союзник не провоцирует {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атаки по возможности{/g} от этих противников, а также может стрелять вблизи и двигаться, игнорируя ограничения, связанные с атаками по возможности.
languages.original_text:
The Vanguard chooses an ally. All enemies in a 3-cell radius around this ally must make a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|ResistancePenalty|dac2896f1b4249648300531819f4d31d} penalty. On a failed {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}, the Vanguard becomes their {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g}.
Regardless of the Willpower resistance test results, the chosen ally does not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} from these enemies, can shoot enemies in melee range, and move as if not within range of attacks of opportunity.

traits.locale_text:
Авангард выбирает союзника. Все противники в радиусе 3 клеток от него должны пройти проверку Воли со штрафом −<u>(5 × бонус ОБЩ авангарда)</u>. В случае провала авангард становится для этого противника приоритетной целью.
Вне зависимости от результата проверки союзник не провоцирует атаки по возможности от этих противников, а также может стрелять вблизи и двигаться, игнорируя ограничения, связанные с атаками по возможности.

Авангард выбирает союзника. Все противники в радиусе 3 клеток от него должны пройти проверку Воли со штрафом −<u>(5 × бонус ОБЩ авангарда)</u>. В случае провала авангард становится для этого противника приоритетной целью.
Вне зависимости от результата проверки союзник не провоцирует атаки по возможности от этих противников, а также может стрелять вблизи и двигаться, игнорируя ограничения, связанные с атаками по возможности.

Авангард выбирает союзника. Все противники в радиусе 3 клеток от него должны пройти {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверку{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воли{/g} со {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штрафом{/g} −{uip|ResistancePenalty|dac2896f1b4249648300531819f4d31d}. В случае провала авангард становится для этого противника {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}приоритетной целью{/g}.
Вне зависимости от результата проверки союзник не провоцирует {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}атаки по возможности{/g} от этих противников, а также может стрелять вблизи и двигаться, игнорируя ограничения, связанные с атаками по возможности.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}先锋{/g}选择一名盟友。该盟友周围3格内所有敌人需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}检定{/g}，且在此次检定中承受-{uip|ResistancePenalty|dac2896f1b4249648300531819f4d31d}{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}。若{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}失败，先锋会成为这些敌人的{g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}优先目标{/g}。
无论意志检定结果如何，盟友都可以射击{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战范围{/g}内的敌人，可以在{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}借机攻{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Range}{/g}击的范围内自由移动，而不会招致这些敌人的借机攻击。
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguard{/g} chooses an ally. All enemies in a 3-cell radius around this ally must make a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|ResistancePenalty|dac2896f1b4249648300531819f4d31d} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}. On a failed {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}, the Vanguard becomes their {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g}.
Regardless of the Willpower resistance test results, the chosen ally does not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} from these enemies, can shoot enemies in {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee range{/g}, and move as if not within {g|Encyclopedia:Range}range{/g} of attacks of opportunity.

traits.locale_text:
先锋选择一名盟友。该盟友周围3格内所有敌人需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}，此次检定结果会承受<u>（5×先锋的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}社交{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}）</u>的{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}。若检定失败，先锋会成为这些敌人的{g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}优先目标{/g}。
无论意志检定结果如何，盟友都可以射击近战范围内的敌人，可以在借机攻击的范围内自由移动，而不会招致这些敌人的{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}借机攻击{/g}。

先锋选择一名盟友。该盟友周围3格内所有敌人需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}，此次检定结果会承受{uip|ResistancePenalty|dac2896f1b4249648300531819f4d31d}的{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}。若检定失败，先锋会成为这些敌人的{g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}优先目标{/g}。
无论意志检定结果如何，盟友都可以射击近战范围内的敌人，可以在借机攻击的范围内自由移动，而不会招致这些敌人的{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}借机攻击{/g}。

languages.text:
El vanguardia elige un aliado. Todos los enemigos situados en un radio de 3 casillas alrededor de este aliado deben realizar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} con una penalización de −{uip|ResistancePenalty|dac2896f1b4249648300531819f4d31d}. Si fallan esta {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g}, el vanguardia se convierte en su {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}objetivo prioritario{/g}.
Sea cual sea el resultado de la prueba de fortaleza de Voluntad, el aliado no provoca {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}ataques de oportunidad{/g} de estos enemigos, puede disparar contra enemigos que se encuentren a alcance cuerpo a cuerpo y puede moverse como si no estuviese al alcance de ataques de oportunidad.
languages.original_text:
The Vanguard chooses an ally. All enemies in a 3-cell radius around this ally must make a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|ResistancePenalty|dac2896f1b4249648300531819f4d31d} penalty. On a failed {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}, the Vanguard becomes their {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g}.
Regardless of the Willpower resistance test results, the chosen ally does not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} from these enemies, can shoot enemies in melee range, and move as if not within range of attacks of opportunity.

traits.locale_text:
El {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}vanguardia{/g} elige un aliado. Todos los enemigos situados en un radio de 3 casillas alrededor de este aliado deben realizar una {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} con una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −{uip|ResistancePenalty|dac2896f1b4249648300531819f4d31d}. Si fallan esta prueba, el vanguardia se convierte en su {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}objetivo prioritario{/g}.
Sea cual sea el resultado de la prueba de Voluntad, el aliado no provoca {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}ataques de oportunidad{/g} de estos enemigos, puede disparar contra enemigos que se encuentren a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}alcance cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} y puede moverse como si no estuviese al {g|Encyclopedia:Range}alcance{/g} de ataques de oportunidad.

El vanguardia elige un aliado. Todos los enemigos situados en un radio de 3 casillas alrededor de este aliado deben realizar una {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} con una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −{uip|ResistancePenalty|dac2896f1b4249648300531819f4d31d}. Si fallan esta prueba, el vanguardia se convierte en su {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}objetivo prioritario{/g}.
Sea cual sea el resultado de la prueba de Voluntad, el aliado no provoca {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}ataques de oportunidad{/g} de estos enemigos, puede disparar contra enemigos que se encuentren a alcance cuerpo a cuerpo y puede moverse como si no estuviese al alcance de ataques de oportunidad.

languages.text:
Die Vorhut wählt einen Verbündeten. Alle Feinde in einem Radius von 3 Feldern um diesen Verbündeten müssen eine {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g} mit einem Abzug von −{uip|ResistancePenalty|dac2896f1b4249648300531819f4d31d} ausführen. Misslingt die {g|Encyclopedia:Test}Probe{/g}, wird die Vorhut zu ihrem {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}Prioritätsziel{/g}.
Ungeachtet der Ergebnisse der Willenskraft-Widerstandsprobe provoziert der ausgewählte Verbündete keine {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}Gelegenheitsangriffe{/g} dieser Feinde. Außerdem kann er auf Feinde in Nahkampfreichweite schießen und sich so bewegen, als würde er sich nicht in der Reichweite von Überraschungsangriffen befinden.
languages.original_text:
The Vanguard chooses an ally. All enemies in a 3-cell radius around this ally must make a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|ResistancePenalty|dac2896f1b4249648300531819f4d31d} penalty. On a failed {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}, the Vanguard becomes their {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g}.
Regardless of the Willpower resistance test results, the chosen ally does not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} from these enemies, can shoot enemies in melee range, and move as if not within range of attacks of opportunity.

traits.locale_text:
Die {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vorhut{/g} wählt einen Verbündeten. Alle Feinde innerhalb eines 3-Felder-Radius um diesen Verbündeten müssen eine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Test}Probe{/g} mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von −{uip|ResistancePenalty|dac2896f1b4249648300531819f4d31d} ausführen. Misslingt die Probe, wird die Vorhut zu ihrem {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}Prioritätsziel{/g}.
Ungeachtet der Ergebnisse der Willenskraft-Probe provoziert der Verbündete keine {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}Gelegenheitsangriffe{/g} dieser Feinde. Außerdem kann er auf Feinde in {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfreichweite{/g} schießen und sich so bewegen, als würde er sich nicht in der {g|Encyclopedia:Range}Reichweite{/g} von Gelegenheitsangriffen befinden.

Die Vorhut wählt einen Verbündeten. Alle Feinde innerhalb einen 3-Felder-Radius um diesen Verbündeten müssen eine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Test}Probe{/g} ausführen, und zwar mit einem −{uip|ResistancePenalty|dac2896f1b4249648300531819f4d31d}-{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g}. Misslingt die Probe, wird die Vorhut zu ihrem {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}Prioritätsziel{/g}.
Ungeachtet der Ergebnisse der Willenskraft-Probe provoziert der Verbündete keine {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}Überraschungsangriffe{/g} dieser Feinde. Außerdem kann er in Nahkampfreichweite schießen und sich so bewegen, als würde er sich nicht in der Reichweite von Überraschungsangriffen befinden.

languages.text:
Le patrouilleur choisit un allié. Tous les ennemis présents dans un rayon de 3 cases autour de cet allié sont soumis à un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Volonté{/g} avec une pénalité de −{uip|ResistancePenalty|dac2896f1b4249648300531819f4d31d}. En cas d'échec au {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}, le patrouilleur devient leur {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}cible prioritaire{/g}.
Quel que soit le résultat du test de résistance de Volonté, l'allié choisi ne provoque pas d'{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaque d'opportunité{/g} de la part de ces ennemis, peut tirer sur les ennemis à portée de mêlée et peut se déplacer comme s'il n'était pas à portée d'attaque d'opportunité.
languages.original_text:
The Vanguard chooses an ally. All enemies in a 3-cell radius around this ally must make a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|ResistancePenalty|dac2896f1b4249648300531819f4d31d} penalty. On a failed {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}, the Vanguard becomes their {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g}.
Regardless of the Willpower resistance test results, the chosen ally does not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} from these enemies, can shoot enemies in melee range, and move as if not within range of attacks of opportunity.

traits.locale_text:
Le Patrouilleur choisit un allié. Tous les ennemis présents dans un rayon de 3 cases autour de cet allié sont soumis à un {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Volonté{/g} avec une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de -<u>(5 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FRA{/g} du Patrouilleur)</u>. En cas d'échec au test, le Patrouilleur devient leur {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}cible prioritaire{/g}.
Quel que soit le résultat du test de Volonté, l'allié ne provoque pas d'{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}attaque d'opportunité{/g} de la part de ces ennemis, peut tirer sur les ennemis situés à portée de combat de mêlée et peut se déplacer comme s'il n'était pas à portée d'attaque d'opportunité.

Le Patrouilleur choisit un allié. Tous les ennemis présents dans un rayon de 3 cases autour de cet allié sont soumis à un {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Volonté{/g} avec une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de -{uip|ResistancePenalty|dac2896f1b4249648300531819f4d31d}. En cas d'échec au test, le Patrouilleur devient leur {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}cible prioritaire{/g}.
Quel que soit le résultat du test de Volonté, l'allié ne provoque pas d'{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}attaque d'opportunité{/g} de la part de ces ennemis, peut tirer sur les ennemis situés à portée de combat de mêlée et peut se déplacer comme s'il n'était pas à portée d'attaque d'opportunité.

languages.text:
まず、{g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}ヴァンガード{/g}が味方を1人選ぶ。味方の周囲3セル以内のすべての敵は、−{uip|ResistancePenalty|dac2896f1b4249648300531819f4d31d}の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}を受けた状態で{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}を行わなければならない。{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}に失敗した敵は、ヴァンガードを{g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}優先ターゲット{/g}にする。
意志力抵抗判定の結果にかかわらず、その味方はそれらの敵から{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}機会攻撃{/g}を受けず、{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接範囲{/g}からその敵に射撃が行なえ、機会攻撃の{g|Encyclopedia:Range}範囲{/g}内にいないかのように移動できる。
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguard{/g} chooses an ally. All enemies in a 3-cell radius around this ally must make a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|ResistancePenalty|dac2896f1b4249648300531819f4d31d} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}. On a failed {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}, the Vanguard becomes their {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g}.
Regardless of the Willpower resistance test results, the chosen ally does not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} from these enemies, can shoot enemies in {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee range{/g}, and move as if not within {g|Encyclopedia:Range}range{/g} of attacks of opportunity.

traits.locale_text:
味方を1人選ぶ。この味方の周囲3セル以内のすべての敵は、−<u>(5 × ヴァンガードの{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FEL{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g})</u>の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}を受けた状態で{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}を行わなければならない。判定に失敗した敵は、ヴァンガードを{g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}優先ターゲット{/g}にする。
意志力判定の結果にかかわらず、その味方はそれらの敵から{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}機会攻撃{/g}を受けず、近接範囲からその敵に射撃が行なえ、機会攻撃の範囲内にいないかのように移動できる。

味方を1人選ぶ。この味方の周囲3セル以内のすべての敵は、−{uip|ResistancePenalty|dac2896f1b4249648300531819f4d31d}の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}を受けた状態で{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}を行わなければならない。判定に失敗した敵は、ヴァンガードを{g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}優先ターゲット{/g}にする。
意志力判定の結果にかかわらず、その味方はそれらの敵から{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}機会攻撃{/g}を受けず、近接範囲からその敵に射撃が行なえ、機会攻撃の範囲内にいないかのように移動できる。

languages.text:
Öncü, bir dost birim seçer. Dost birimin etrafındaki 3 hücrelik yarıçap içinde bulunan tüm düşmanlar, −{uip|ResistancePenalty|dac2896f1b4249648300531819f4d31d} ceza puanına sahip bir {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}İrade{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testine{/g} girmelidir. Öncü, bu {g|Encyclopedia:Test}testte{/g} başarısız olanların {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}öncelikli hedefi{/g} hâline gelir.
Seçilen dost birim, İrade direnç testinin sonucundan bağımsız olarak bu düşmanların {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}fırsat saldırılarını{/g} tetiklemez. Yakın dövüş menzilinden düşmanlara ateş edebilir ve fırsat saldırılarının menzilinde değilmiş gibi hareket edebilir.
languages.original_text:
The Vanguard chooses an ally. All enemies in a 3-cell radius around this ally must make a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|ResistancePenalty|dac2896f1b4249648300531819f4d31d} penalty. On a failed {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}, the Vanguard becomes their {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g}.
Regardless of the Willpower resistance test results, the chosen ally does not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} from these enemies, can shoot enemies in melee range, and move as if not within range of attacks of opportunity.
